labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Roles take a long time to sort and end up sorting incorrectly when moving them
data.expected_result: Roles should move flawlessly and sort correctly
data.short_description: having extreme amounts of roles tends to lag the list and make it extremely difficult to move them
data.steps_to_repro: - Have about 100+ roles  - Try and sort them
